channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Low Tree branches overhanging pavement, 4th July
item.description:
Low Tree branches overhanging pavement making it difficult to walk on narrow pavement without stepping into the road . Lots of school children use this route to school. The tree is located by Lime Close. Not sure if the tree is public or part of the close/nursing home. Can it be pruned at all?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southborough Road, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish under recycling bins and in car park, 4th July
item.description:
The recycling bins are standing on a mountain of rubbish theses bins need lifting and cleaning under and around ,the amount of glass ,plastic clothes bottles etc is awful .There is general rubbish around the car park which is continuously being cleaned by the council but the rubbish surrounding theses bins is a complete eyesore and encourages vermin ,this has been cleaned under for over a year

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Steynton Avenue, Albany Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unpaved road deteriorating, rocks, potholes, obstructing vegetation and weeds, fire hazards, 4th July
item.description:
Unpaved road deteriorating, rocks, potholes, obstructing and unchecked vegetation and weeds, fire hazards in dry conditions and unsafe road to drive. Dust clouds from passing vehicles and absence of sidewalks, hazards for pedestrians. Bromley council needs to pave the road. This is unacceptable in London 2025.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hillbrow Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Body of a dead mouse Mounfield Rd/Ravensdale Rd, 4th July
item.description:
On the corner of Mounfield Road and Ravensdale Road, in Hackney ,there is a DEAD MOUSE , with flies flying over the body of the dead animal. Please send someone to pick up the body of the dead animal. I have seen this 15mn ago only. Hackney resident
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ravensdale Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
